verses.plain: He that dwelleth in the secret place of the most High shall abide under the shadow of the Almighty.

tokens.t: He that dwelleth in the secret place of the most High shall abide under the shadow of the Almighty.

verses.plain: I will say of the LORD, He is my refuge and my fortress: my God; in him will I trust.

tokens.t: I will say of the
my refuge and my fortress: my God; in him will I trust.

verses.plain: Surely he shall deliver thee from the snare of the fowler, and from the noisome pestilence.

tokens.t: Surely he shall deliver thee from the snare of the fowler,
from the noisome pestilence.

verses.plain: He shall cover thee with his feathers, and under his wings shalt thou trust: his truth shall be thy shield and buckler.

tokens.t: He shall cover thee with his feathers, and under his wings shalt thou trust: his truth
shield and buckler.

verses.plain: Thou shalt not be afraid for the terror by night; nor for the arrow that flieth by day;

tokens.t: Thou shalt not be afraid for the terror by night;
for the arrow
flieth by day;

verses.plain: Nor for the pestilence that walketh in darkness; nor for the destruction that wasteth at noonday.

tokens.t: for the pestilence
walketh in darkness;
for the destruction
wasteth at noonday.

verses.plain: A thousand shall fall at thy side, and ten thousand at thy right hand; but it shall not come nigh thee.

tokens.t: A thousand shall fall at thy side, and ten thousand at thy right hand;
it shall not come nigh thee.

verses.plain: Only with thine eyes shalt thou behold and see the reward of the wicked.

tokens.t: Only with thine eyes shalt thou behold and see the reward of the wicked.

verses.plain: Because thou hast made the LORD, which is my refuge, even the most High, thy habitation;

tokens.t: Because thou hast made the
my refuge,
the most High, thy habitation;

verses.plain: There shall no evil befall thee, neither shall any plague come nigh thy dwelling.

tokens.t: There shall no evil befall thee, neither shall any plague come nigh thy dwelling.

verses.plain: For he shall give his angels charge over thee, to keep thee in all thy ways.

tokens.t: For he shall give his angels charge over thee, to keep thee in all thy ways.

verses.plain: They shall bear thee up in their hands, lest thou dash thy foot against a stone.

tokens.t: They shall bear thee up in
hands, lest thou dash thy foot against a stone.

verses.plain: Thou shalt tread upon the lion and adder: the young lion and the dragon shalt thou trample under feet.

tokens.t: Thou shalt tread upon the lion and adder: the young lion and the dragon shalt thou trample under feet.

verses.plain: Because he hath set his love upon me, therefore will I deliver him: I will set him on high, because he hath known my name.

tokens.t: Because he hath set his love upon me, therefore will I deliver him: I will set him on high, because he hath known my name.

verses.plain: He shall call upon me, and I will answer him: I will be with him in trouble; I will deliver him, and honour him.

tokens.t: He shall call upon me, and I will answer him: I
with him in trouble; I will deliver him, and honour him.

verses.plain: With long life will I satisfy him, and shew him my salvation.

tokens.t: With long life will I satisfy him, and shew him my salvation.
